com.googlecode.streamflyer.regex.addons.stateful

Class State

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.streamflyer.regex.addons.stateful.State

  • public class State
extends Object
    A state of the match process. The state is reached if the corresponding token is matched.

    The state transitions can be set via setTransitions(List, TransitionGuard).

    Since:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    rwoo

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Token token
      The token that must be matched to reach this state.
      private Transitions transitions
      The transitions that can be applied.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      State(String stateName)
      A constructor to create an initial state.
      State(String stateName, String regex)
      If this constructed state is reached, the stream is not modified.
      State(String stateName, String regex, MatchProcessor matchProcessor)
      If the constructed state is reached then the given MatchProcessor modifies the stream.
      State(String stateName, String regex, String replacement)
      This constructor defines a state so that text of the matched state token is replaced with the given replacement.
      State(Token token)
      The constructed state is reached if the given token is matched.

    • Constructor Detail

      • State

        public State(String stateName)
        A constructor to create an initial state.
        Parameters:
        stateName - A unique name for the state.

      • State

        public State(String stateName,
     String regex)
        If this constructed state is reached, the stream is not modified.
        Parameters:
        stateName - A unique name for the state.
        regex - In order to reach this state, this regular expression must be matched.

      • State

        public State(String stateName,
     String regex,
     String replacement)
        This constructor defines a state so that text of the matched state token is replaced with the given replacement.
        Parameters:
        stateName - A unique name for the state.
        regex - In order to reach this state, this regular expression must be matched.
        replacement - The replacement defines how the text that is matched via #regex shall be replaced.

      • State

        public State(String stateName,
     String regex,
     MatchProcessor matchProcessor)
        If the constructed state is reached then the given MatchProcessor modifies the stream.
        Parameters:
        stateName - A unique name for the state.
        regex - In order to reach this state, this regular expression must be matched.
        matchProcessor - If the constructed state is reached then the given MatchProcessor modifies the stream.

      • State

        public State(Token token)
        The constructed state is reached if the given token is matched.
        Parameters:
        token - See token

    • Method Detail

      • setTransitions

        public void setTransitions(List<State> endStates,
                  TransitionGuard transitionGuard)
        Convenience method.

        Sets transitions as defined by the reachable states and the transition guard.

        Parameters:
        endStates - the states that can be reached from the this state.
        transitionGuard - this guard can stop the transition or add additional logic to the transition.

      • setTransitions

        public void setTransitions(Transitions transitions)
        Sets transitions.
        Parameters:
        transitions - the transitions to set.

      • getToken

        public Token getToken()
        Returns:
        Returns the token that must be matched to reach this state.

      • getTransitions

        public Transitions getTransitions()
        Returns:
        Returns the token processor that must be used to switch to the next state.

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
